data.name: Bags
data.title: Bags - Djembe Accessories
data.description: Lightweight, but strong djembe bags from Ghana. These bags have a drawstring top, meaning that there's no zip to break. They're comfortable; they're strong enough for even the heaviest of djembes and they look fantastic. For a simple, no-frills, reliable djembe bag at a fraction of the cost of their "professional" counterparts, these bags really are perfect.
data.description2: Currently out of stock. I'm talking with new suppliers in Ghana and more bags will be available in early 2016.

data.name: Bells and Sticks
data.title: Bells and Sticks - Djembe Accessories
data.description: Iron bells and wooden sticks for ballet or trad-style dunun playing.

data.name: 12 Key Balafons
data.title: 12 Key Balafons
data.description:
High quality tuned 12 key wooden balafons. The keys are made from Khadi wood - often referred to as Balafon Wood - and each key has a resonator gourd beneath it. The music they produce is earthy, warm and cheerful.

Each balafon sold comes with a pair of gum-rubber mallets.

data.name: 8 Key Balafons
data.title: 8 Key Balafons
data.description:
8 key wooden balafons. The keys are made from Khadi wood - often referred to as Balafon Wood - and each key has a resonator gourd beneath it. The music they produce is earthy, warm and cheerful.

Each balafon sold comes with a pair of gum-rubber mallets.

data.name: Ksink Ksink
data.title: Ksink Ksink - Djembe Accessories
data.description: Percussive djembe decoration for stage performances. Add a little sizzle to your sound and your look.

data.name: Shea Butter - Hand Nourishment
data.title: Shea Butter - Hand Nourishment - Djembe Accessories
data.description:
100ml tubs of fortified shea butter. All our blends include skin strengthening tincture of benzoin that helps prevent damage and speeds up the healing process when damage does occur.

Our blends include:
Warming Ginger
Fragrance of the Forest
Invigorating Citrus
Relaxing Bergamot
